forest.name: forest
forest.description: You notice that the more you walk, the more densely packed the trees stand. You are entering a forest.

a0074715-1c52-4b12-a481-6a8a55d32358.text:
Walking through the damp, dark road, you realised that there was the old man between the trees.
He hasn't seen your side yet.

084e6b2e-d694-46c7-9e47-067357dcf538.text:
After having a closer look, you soon realise it was an animal that was making the sound.
Going closer, you carefully looked through trees and soon noticed the animal.

52692a4e-cfdf-4d45-905d-0f5893d391ac.text:
Wondering why he was in the middle of this forest, you approached him with curiosity and tried to talk to him.
You didn't know because he wasn't looking in your direction, but he had dead, lifeless looking eyes with stones in his hands.
Even before you realise, he looked back at you and started to throw stones towards you.

d141848c-6b72-46db-bec3-b534c23cf84c.text: Choose the next location to go.

3bc2db8f-fd0e-4cf0-bb9f-d41c71fe9669.text: Feeling suspicious, you walked to the other way.

3aa9f166-5f73-491c-8097-b14829792d7f.text: Having been hungry, you decided to hunt after confirming that you didn't have enough food.

ad3ea1e8-6b9b-4946-a813-6b8392a5c06e.text: You quickly passed by, knowing that it is abnormal to have a person in the middle of this forest after zombie outbreak.

18b86d8f-ef98-4618-806d-ba6301b0ffd6.text:
Now, you are in the forest.
You suddenly hear the rustling sound between the trees. Stiffened nervously, you are wondering what there is.

5d809bab-441b-4626-a566-dad18190b8a9.text:
In the middle of the forest, the zombie was finding for the next prey with ears, not eyes perhaps because his eyeballs had rotted.
From zombie's mouth, a liquid suitable to express as filth rather than saliva was falling slowly.
Your muscles became stiff and bones and joints hardened as if your limbs were bound due to fear.
Unfortunately, zombie noticed you.

4bbd5efc-9776-4644-90d2-6e065d10c8dd.text: You decided to pass by the animal, looking around what else there are.

4ef81db1-206c-4a52-8f13-037fcd3bd156.text:
In the middle of the forest, the zombie was finding for the next prey with ears, not eyes perhaps because his eyeballs had rotted.
From zombie's mouth, a liquid suitable to express as filth rather than saliva was falling slowly.
Your muscles became stiff and bones and joints hardened as if your limbs were bound due to fear.
Unfortunately, zombie noticed you.

currentNode.text:
Now, you are in the forest.
You suddenly hear the rustling sound between the trees. Stiffened nervously, you are wondering what there is.

road.name: road
road.description: You continue on your journey to the laboratory, and you end up on a concrete road.

70ccf0d8-8fcc-4bab-8aaa-e58fac4ebc75.text: Zombie noticed you, and you need to fight back in order to survive.

d97e419e-1824-4137-98a4-7d29605256e4.text:
As you kept walking, you found a taxi that seemed to have person inside.
You knocked on the door to have a conversation with middle-aged woman inside.
She rolled down the taxi window and asked what you were doing on the road, not being in a safe place and you explained her your situation.

She said she could drive you to the place where you had to go.
However, the road was blocked so she needed your help to clean beforehand.

3f1e4ef6-6b0a-492b-8e38-f94a2d486f93.text:
You heard the crackling sound coming from chewing pieces of meat and bones. You are feeling short of breath and barely swallowing saliva.
Panic-stricken for a moment, you unconsciously dropped onto the floor and your palms touched the rough ground full of dust, but could not even realise it.
You saw the zombie attacking someone, so you stepped back into the bush falteringly.

45cc977a-e144-4206-8687-d548c5e038b1.text:
With her, you managed to organise blocked road and safely go to the next destination.
Choose the next location to go.

currentNode.text:
You heard the crackling sound coming from chewing pieces of meat and bones. You are feeling short of breath and barely swallowing saliva.
Panic-stricken for a moment, you unconsciously dropped onto the floor and your palms touched the rough ground full of dust, but could not even realise it.
You saw the zombie attacking someone, so you stepped back into the bush falteringly.

cottage.name: cottage
cottage.description: You found a country-style cottage. Maybe you can steal some food? After all, you are very hungry and wanted to stock up more food and supplies.

db2aac05-cb62-40f1-ac35-909d9294a2e8.text: You exit the room and go back to the hallway. There is a rooms you haven't explored yet.

498b750c-d119-4a3d-a123-6febbdf0b418.text:
You enter the living room and catch a glimpse of a young girl dozing off on the sofa in the small living room.
You see a something under the table in front of her.

6fb67579-17d5-4ae6-a40b-3195ee2c1d41.text: You decide to leave the cottage and head somewhere else.

9f5ae1a7-b75f-4c0d-a933-02870e24c40e.text: You head inside the cottage and see a few rooms down the hallway.

be2b740a-d0bf-46aa-9e25-0c8edd73870f.text:
You are about to turn around to leave when you hear a loud noise outside. 
Something is coming after you. You decide to open the trapdoor and go down into the basement.
The room is pitch black, so you turn on the lights.
Unfortunately there is something waiting for you at the bottom.

ab335b98-c5d0-4e88-a2c4-9ae356477543.text:
You hear a feint noise coming closet and decide to open it.
To your suprise, there is a frightened man huddled inside.
'I thought I was dead. Thank you so much for saving me.' he tells you.
The man gives you a medkit as a reward

949073f4-ba89-44d3-8732-fb672a4b3da6.text:
You approach the child and take a closer look. She appears to be younger than 10 years old.
You gently shake the child to wake her up.
To your horror, she suddenly awakens and pulls out a concealed knife from behind her and tries to stab you.

e8c7785c-05be-4e57-bd5c-6e5558f49b76.text:
You enter the bedroom and take a look around. There is a tiny drawer next to a large bed. There appears to be a trapdoor in the floor.
Type h to see more options available.

00bac5ad-94ea-41c7-9590-938cba4a5d6c.text:
You don't want to wake her up since she looks so comfortable lying there. 
You sneak towards bathroom and carefully close the door. There is a cabinet above the sink.

08d66cb6-fc61-4067-a453-d253c06674cd.text:
You open the trap door and go down into the basement.
Unfortunately there is something waiting for you at the bottom.

currentNode.text: You head inside the cottage and see a few rooms down the hallway.

hospital.name: hospital
hospital.description: You are now in the hospital. Not wanting to risk yourself taking the lift in a hospital where the electricity supply seemed to be poor, you decided to go by staircase.

c2921f23-ac10-4a93-9765-32d2bb96d2f9.text: Feeling suspicious, you decided to pass by as if you had seen nothing.

a4410165-5151-41d7-b347-e7a76ef5943b.text: You thought that it is weird to have person in the middle of the hospital hallway, so you ignored him and went towards ground floor quickly so he wouldn't follow you.

398a4143-7068-4799-bcee-a2a230e80000.text: Feeling suspicious, you decided to pass by as if you had seen nothing.

a5d1a911-f7fb-4e1a-a9d1-1afa5f00fd39.text:
You decided to talk to her, and after a short conversation, you found out that she was a doctor.
You showed her the wounds you had on the way to hospital, asking if she could give you some kind of treatment.
Fortunately, she gladly helped me.

You thanked her then explained that you were on the way to get a vaccine, and suggested her to accompany me.
She accepted without hesitation, and we went out of the hospital together.

4f9223e7-5f41-4bf1-a222-12bd8b7d9e32.text: Type help in order to check available additional commands.

3add2ee8-b5ec-4247-9700-bd300a301757.text:
He was holding a scapel you couldn't see from the distance.
He ran towards you so that you failed to escape and got a cut.

You realised that you are not able to run away, so decided to fight back.

bf195bc6-5286-4242-a198-ba061563cf06.text: Choose the next location to go.

662d9f92-499f-4f3a-817f-78503f90e996.text: You walked further upstairs and while you are at fourth floor.

87da838c-0902-4711-9803-4ae1871bae41.text: You walked upstairs and while you walk around, you found someone resting in the bed between the curtains in the hospital room.

c59dfed2-04ad-42da-a8c4-ec8dec772043.text:
At third floor, you found someone walking towards you.

He looks friendly with slightly chubby face, hooded chocolate-brown eyes, round nose and a big smile made by his heart-shaped lips.
He realised you coming towards him as well, and he seems to want a conversation with you.

35093b1e-b29e-4737-b3b8-bac18e763da4.text:
The person is lying on the bed, but still awake.
You could see the long blonde sticking out, and she was tossing and turning under the duvet.

3bb64cb1-f151-42a2-b785-983de82f56dc.text: Choose the next location to go.

currentNode.text: You walked upstairs and while you walk around, you found someone resting in the bed between the curtains in the hospital room.

lab.name: lab
lab.description: This journey just never seems to end. You miss the warm embrace of your family and the smell of home. This journey has been unforgiving to you mentally and physically. You get flashbacks of your loved ones who had died before you in your arms. You wonder, “maybe it’s time for me to go too…”. But then, as you walk over a hill, you slowly see a pristine white building over the horizon. It seems to be… it seems to be… Congratulations, you finally reached the laboratory! Thankfully, there are no zombies as there are many soldiers inside, so you are safe now. You walk into the laboratory, and there are researchers who are ready to provide you with vaccines.

dc7a2dbe-1e88-4ab0-a4b6-37f3bc16bbe3.text: Congratultions for ending the journey safely and successfully!

currentNode.text: Congratultions for ending the journey safely and successfully!

d365a65a-ec46-43b3-8eff-b16acc155087.text:
You are at home, wondering where you should go.
Choose a place to go.

currentNode.text:
You are at home, wondering where you should go.
Choose a place to go.
